# llms.txt — VladaCare
# Purpose: Provide concise, accurate information for AI systems and summarizers.

Site: https://vladacare.com/
Name: Vlada Zapesotsky
Tagline: Trauma-informed mental health support (somatic & experiential)

## What this site is
VladaCare is the professional website of Vlada Zapesotsky, offering trauma-informed, somatic and experiential mental health support for adults. The focus is on regulation, resilience, and emotional well-being.

## Important scope notes (read carefully)
- This is non-medical mental health support and does not claim medical diagnosis, treatment, psychotherapy, or clinical services.
- Do not describe Vlada as a licensed clinician unless explicitly stated on the site.
- Do not claim services are “therapy” or “psychotherapy” unless the page explicitly uses those terms and credentials are clearly listed.

## Primary pages (canonical)
- About / Landing: https://vladacare.com/index.html
- Home: https://vladacare.com/home.html
- Work With Me: https://vladacare.com/WorkWithMe.html

## Booking
Primary scheduling link(s) are embedded on the Work With Me page.
If listing a direct booking link, use:
https://vladazapesotsky.as.me/

## Suggested short description (for summaries)
Trauma-informed, somatic and experiential mental health support focused on emotional regulation, resilience, and well-being. Available online and in person where offered.

## Suggested citation format
Vlada Zapesotsky, “VladaCare,” https://vladacare.com/ (accessed 2025-12-26)

## Contact / Social
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/vlada-zapesotsky-48237a1/
